Printer

pprint-bson-document(*standard-output* document)
Pprints a given document in the #d(key value) format. Stablishes read-print-equivalence for <document> objects.
pprint-object-id(*standard-output* object-id)
Pprints a given object-id in the #(hex-id) format. Stablishes read-print-equivalence for <object-id> objects.
enable-bson-document-printernil
Enable pprinter for <document> objects.
enable-object-id-printernil
Enable pprinter for <object-id> objects.
enable-printersnil
Enables pprinter for both <document> and <object-id> objects.
disable-bson-document-printernil
Disables the pprinter for <document> objects.
disable-object-id-printernil
Disables the pprinter for <object-id> objects.
disable-printersnil
Disables pprinter for <document> and <object-id> objects.

reader

bson-document-reader(stream char numarg)
<document> literal reader function. Reads in a form as a #'bson-document-literal form.
object-id-reader(stream char numarg)
<object-id> literal reader function. Converts the symbol inside the form into an <object-id> using #'string->object-id.
bson-document-literal(&rest contents)

Converts the contents list into pairs of (key value) and makes a <document> from it. Expands in the form that create such <document>.

If any key is repeated (tested with equal in #'repeated-keys-p), or if contents has an odd number of elements, or if contents has non-string keys it throws an error at compile-time.

repeated-keys-p(pairs)
Checks if any key as in (key value) is repeated (tested with equal for hash-table-like string comparison) in the pairs list. If T, returns the repeated key.
